participant_abstract.sent: We went over the previous meeting and then went into the detailed presentations from the designers and from marketing.

The marketing expert had some interesting (!) ideas about fruit and veg shapes and textures, some of which were brought down to earth by the industrial and user interface designers' emphasis on practicalities.
We concluded by agreeing the next tasks for each team member.

participant_actions.sent: PM - keeping it together and doing minutes.

participant_decisions.sent: Mostly about component design: - energy source: kinetic preferred, as long as cost permits; otherwise standard batteries .
Case: if possible, spongy rubber with a hard plastic inner for strength .
Interface: simple push buttons; scroll function mimicked with group of directional push buttons .
Fruit theme if poss: banana possibly.

participant_problems.sent: Still not sure what all the components actually cost, so difficult to make informed reccommendations between options .
